texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor
texts.overview: The South English Legendary collection of saints' lives (English)
texts.adaptation: A verse Life in English, based on Aelred of Rievaulx's Vita S. Edwardi (perhaps via a French translation)
texts.integrated: An addition to the South English Legendary
texts.fragment: fragment (the last item in the MS; these leaves are in a fragmentary state)

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor

texts.name: Jatvaroar saga

texts.overview: Kings' sagas, romances, saints' lives, and other historical material (Old Norse)
